name: Egg's Eggsoddus
description:
Tired of lying around in a basket of eggs in space kitchen waiting to be eaten? What a coincidence egg planet is just around the corner! But first you must find a way off this weird space ship. So pull your egg yolk together and start rolling. How eggciting!

Controls:
WASD: Movement
Mouse: Camera
Esc: Skip Cutscene, pause menu

Please leave a rating and a comment with feedback. Aloah!
